Package killdrluckygame

Class GameCharacter

java.lang.Object
killdrluckygame.GameCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Character
public class GameCharacter extends Object implements Character
The GameCharacter class represents a game character and implements the Character interface. It stores information about the character's health, name, and whether it is the target character.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameCharacter

      public GameCharacter(int health, String characterName, boolean isTarget) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Initializes the game character with the specified health, name, and target status.
      Parameters:
      health - The health value of the character.
      characterName - The name of the character.
      isTarget - Specifies whether the character is the target.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the character name is empty or the health value is negative.
